name: John Doe
textReview: Great place for quiet study. The atmosphere is calm, and the study spaces are clean and well-lit. I visit here often to focus on my assignments.

name: Sarah Lee
textReview: This place gets a bit crowded during the afternoons, but it’s a good spot overall. The noise level is manageable, though I prefer it quieter. A solid place for studying if you're not too distracted.

name: Alex Smith
textReview: Perfect for focused study sessions. The noise is minimal, and the lighting is excellent. I love studying here when the weather is nice. It’s never too busy either, so I can always find a spot.
